lead_paragraph: China's highest court has ruled in favor of former basketball star Michael Jordan in a long-running trademark case relating to a local sportswear firm using the Chinese version of his name, overturning earlier rulings against the athlete.

headline.main: China's Top Court Rules in Michael Jordan's Favor in Trademark Case
headline.print_headline: China's Top Court Rules in Michael Jordan's Favor in Trademark Case

snippet: China's highest court has ruled in favor of former basketball star Michael Jordan in a long-running trademark case relating to a local sportswear firm using the Chinese version of his name, overturning earlier rulings against the athlete....
